text: Rhoon is a village in the Dutch province of South Holland. It is in the Albrandswaard municipality and had 16,066 inhabitants in 2020.Allecijfers.nl Rhoon used to be a municipality. It became part of the new Albrandswaard municipality on 1 January 1985. ==References== Category:20th-century disestablishments in the Netherlands Category:Settlements in South Holland Category:Former municipalities of South Holland
title: Rhoon
